name: Usage of Sysinternals Tools
description: Detects the usage of Sysinternals Tools due to accepteula key being added to Registry
false_positives: Programs that use the same Registry Key
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:CreateKey AND registry.path:*\\EulaAccepted)`
